p: Altogether the protein chip-based array indicates some new factors (IL7, MIPs, sTNFαRI) and confirm some old ones (IL10, IL6, IL5, IL12, VEGF, TGFβ 1 and NGF), all indicative of an active inflammatory process, as previously described [ 60, 61]. Indeed, both protein and mRNA evaluations highlight the presence of an active process of tissue remodeling and angiogenesis (MMP2, MMP7, VEGF, TGFβ 1). Current studies are underway to correlate this glaucomatous TM expression with those of some glaucomatous body fluids (aqueous, tears and blood).
